page.title: 08Religion in our area
page.content: The church building is actually just outside the village but the church does play a big part in village life. There is a servise every sunday but it changes each time.Cummunion 9.30 a.m.Family worship 10.30 a.m.Evening song 6.30p.m. The choir are all under 20years and meet for practises twice a week,and some of them have organ lessons. The rector runs different groups for the village with help from his wife and others.Sunday group 11 and over who have treasure hunts,other games and activities including camping. Tuesday group 4-7 years who draw, paint,play games and have stories. Wednesday group 8-11years who write, paint,have games and go camping.O.A.P. meet on Thursdays.The church holds events to raise money.
